creator: bob_kimball@yahoo.com
text:
The current code supporting the StarTeam "stlabel" task uses the StarTeam Label 
class (which is deprecated) to create view labels.  The Label class doesn't 
support creating a view label as a "build" label.  The View class, which the 
StarTeam SDK documentation suggests using, provides the createViewLabel method 
that allows the caller to specify the label as a "build" label.  A good reason 
to make this change is that it will allow the view label to be selected in the 
StarTeam change request "Addressed in build" field.

creator: antoine@apache.org
text: starteam ant tasks have been removed starting with Ant 1.8.0
